0: There are places where the tile may be cracking or a little rust in the corner of a bathroom but you almost have to be looking for these things to find them and if you do find them you have to really focus on them in order for them to be a big deal
We considered getting a pool view room but I think it would have been much louder with people drinking and playing in the pool
Edwin then offered us a ground level room in building 14 with a plunge pool
You could check out the list of daily activities provided to your room and in the lobby or you could do nothing
We ordered nachos on the first night and they came to us cold and stale so we did not bother with room service again
Each day someone cleaned the room and came for turn down service
Our room was in block 5 on the second floor over looking the cascade pool
The tepanyaki room is a bit tricky to reserve but awesome in the end kudos Jorgi
I nearly burned my foot when I tried to get in it so I only used the tub once
We had upgraded to Excellence Club and although I asked for a twin bedded room they gave us a double bed so mobility difficulties made sleeping a real problem
1: The room was beautiful and quiet the restaurants were really good Flavour Market was closed during our entire stay which was a shame the beach was incredible but I can not focus on anything else but the staff
They came in twice a day with fresh towels if needed and cleaned the bathroom a second time which we really appreciated
Views were beautiful and service was excellent
• Beach towels are provided plus they leave 2 in your room when you arrive
Was briskly taken to excellence check in where we were upgraded to a ocean front view complimentary from excellence group
We chose Excellence Punta Cana because it was such a good deal 70 CAD less per person than ERC for a standard club room

We had breakfast at the Magna Club out on the deck every morning looking out at the beautiful beach and surf the food was top drawer and the service provided by the Magna crew supervised by Jhony was always great
Bags were waiting in our room when we got to it the concierge staff was very accommodating and I can not say anything bad up to this point
Spacious rooms kept clean with maid service twice a day
Rooms are amazing we had a room in building 10 non club the view of the pool and the ocean from there was amazing
